title: Refined Warsaw Retreat with Rooftop Bar and Dazzling Views
description: In the beating heart of this dynamic city, Crowne Plaza Warsaw - The Hub, an IHG Hotel, is an urban haven boasting captivating views and refined dining. Feast on authentic Polish cuisine with locally sourced and foraged ingredients at Nova Wola restaurant, or refresh body and mind at the fitness centre. Visit heritage attractions and vibrant cafes, bars and restaurants before indulging in an expertly mixed cocktail on the sky-high outdoor terrace of The Roof Bar, gazing out over Warsaw.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Warsaw - The HUB, an IHG Hotel

title: Trendy Warsaw Retreat with City Views
description: Discover the perfect balance of cosmopolitan contemporary style and respect for Poland’s cultural history with a stay at Hotel Indigo Warsaw - Nowy Swiat, an IHG Hotel. This captivating capital city is rich in ancestral treasures, mesmerising architecture, tranquil outdoor spaces and innovative dining experiences. Spend your days exploring the streets of this vibrant city before retreating to this trendy oasis to relax in complete luxury and savour delicious Polish cuisine at Restaurant FLO.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Warsaw - Nowy Swiat, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Warsaw Nobu Escape with World-Famous Restaurant & Sake Bar
description: Discover the history, culture and beauty of Poland while staying in five-star luxury at the ultra-stylish Nobu Hotel Warsaw. Get lost in the trendy streets of Srodmiescie, before returning to your hotel’s state-of-the-art spa on the rooftop of the hotel, complete with a sauna and fitness centre. Take a seat at the first-in-the-world Sake Bar by Nobu on the ground-floor terrace, or be wined and dined at the signature Nobu Warsaw, where you can savour Japanese and Latin-American-inspired cuisine.

title: Sophisticated Five-Star Warsaw Escape near UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Old Town
description: Discover Poland’s many wonders with a five-star stay at InterContinental Warsaw, an IHG Hotel. Located directly opposite the city’s iconic Palace of Culture and Science and minutes from the elegant gardens of Warsaw’s UNESCO-listed Old Town, the modern hotel is the perfect base to discover the best of Poland’s capital. Savour modern Polish cuisine on handmade plates at Platter by Karol Okrasa or laze by the hotel's shimmering rooftop pool for unbeatable city views.

title: Five-Star Warsaw Nobu Elegance with Iconic Restaurant & Sake Bar
description: Discover the history, culture and beauty of Poland while staying in five-star luxury at the ultra-stylish Nobu Hotel Warsaw. Get lost in the trendy streets of Srodmiescie, before returning to your hotel’s state-of-the-art spa, complete with a sauna and fitness centre. Take a seat at the first-in-the-world Sakebar by Nobu on the ground-floor terrace, or be wined and dined at the signature Nobu Warsaw, where you can savour Japanese and Peruvian-American-inspired cuisine.
